materials.raw_text:
18 grams of Barium (Ba) 
 36 grams of Gadolinium (Gd) 
 2 grams of Strontium (Sr)

 Strontium: Available through chemical supply companies or online retailers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 18 grams of Barium, 36 grams of Gadolinium, and 2 grams of Strontium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Carefully place all weighed materials into a clean, dry ceramic crucible. 
 3. Mix the powders thoroughly using a spatula or glass rod to ensure homogeneity.
